column4: i have a second hdd. i looked up its uuid with blkid and added " UUID=3820cd30-804a-4a99-b81d-54908eafa38b /mnt/f ext3 defaults 0 0 " to my /etc/fstab. but my drive does not mount when i reboot
can anyone give me a hand?

i did (  i have a second hdd. i looked up its uuid with blkid and added " UUID=3820cd30-804a-4a99-b81d-54908eafa38b /mnt/f ext3 defaults 0 0 " to my /etc/fstab. but my drive does not mount when i reboot )
